criteria: Understanding the Relationship Between Differentiability and Continuity
descriptions: Student demonstrates no understanding of differentiability or its properties.
Student shows minimal understanding of differentiability; struggles to define it or provide examples.
Student can define differentiability but struggles to explain its implications.
Student understands differentiability and can explain its basic implications with some accuracy.
Student demonstrates a strong understanding of differentiability and can accurately explain its implications and provide relevant examples.
Student demonstrates a comprehensive understanding of differentiability, can explain its nuances, and apply it to complex problems effectively.
Student demonstrates no understanding of continuity or its properties.
Student shows minimal understanding of continuity; struggles to define it or provide examples.
Student can define continuity but struggles to explain its implications.
Student understands continuity and can explain its basic implications with some accuracy.
Student demonstrates a strong understanding of continuity and can accurately explain its implications and provide relevant examples.
Student demonstrates a comprehensive understanding of continuity, can explain its nuances, and apply it to complex problems effectively.
Student demonstrates no understanding of the relationship between differentiability and continuity.
Student shows confusion and incorrectly relates differentiability and continuity.
Student can state that differentiability implies continuity but lacks deeper understanding or justification.
Student can explain that differentiability implies continuity and provides some basic justification.
Student clearly explains that differentiability implies continuity, justifies the statement with supporting arguments, and provides counterexamples to illustrate limitations.
Student demonstrates a deep understanding of the relationship, can explain and justify with rigor, and apply the concepts to solve advanced problems.
